behavior activate_remote_for_dvd(remote:item, dvd_player:item):

        achieve is_on(dvd_player)

Listen to music.cdl:
behavior locate_cd_player(cd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, cd_player)

Wash dishes with dishwasher.cdl:
behavior load_dishwasher(o:item, dishwasher:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(o, dishwasher)
Wash dishes with dishwasher.source_sub_task: 1. Load the bowls and plates into the dishwasher.

Wash dishes with dishwasher.cdl:
behavior wash_forks_by_hand(fork:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(fork, sink)
        # Ensure the fork is placed inside the sink
        
        bind soap: item where:
            is_soap(soap) and close(soap, sink)
        # Use soap located near the sink

        wash(fork)
        # Wash the fork by hand

Change TV channel.cdl:
behavior sit_on_couch(couch:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, couch)
        # Sit on the couch

Pet cat.cdl:
behavior approach_cat_and_touch():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        achieve close_char(char, cat)
        touch(cat)
Pet cat.source_sub_task: 2. Approach the cat and touch it.

Pet cat.cdl:
behavior calm_cat(cat:item):
    body:
        approach_cat_and_touch()
        # Assuming this behavior will calm the cat
Pet cat.source_sub_task: 2. Prepare the cat for washing, ensuring it is calm and secure.
functions:
def has_faucet_1(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
    return has_faucet

Pet cat.cdl:
behavior secure_cat(cat:item):
    body:
        if not close_char(char, cat):
            achieve close_char(char, cat)
        # If not already close to the cat, move closer
